name: Exemplary sustainable self-builds
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: From individual self-build to group projects, this session looks at a variety of exemplary schemes including a small group of affordable sustainable homes designed for easy construction by self-builders; a Passivhaus self-build exemplar; and a retrofit project certified to Passivhaus standard.

presentations.name: Group & individual self-build projects compared
presentations.speakers: Jon Broome, Architect, Jon Broome Architects and Author, 'The Green Self-Build Book'

presentations.name: Case study: building a Passivhaus: client's perspective
Case study: the Devon Land Society scheme
presentations.speakers: Don Lang, Director, The Land Society in Devon
